import React from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Button, Image, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const ThreeStepGuide = () => { return (
{/*

HOW TO USE

*/}

HOW TO USE

{/* Step 1 */}
①

Grab a Toothpaste Bit

A single Bit is all you need each time.

{/* Step 2 */}
②

Chew your Bit

A soft paste will form in your mouth.

{/* Step 3 */}
③

Brush with a wet toothbrush

It'll foam up, just like regular toothpaste.

 {/* Shop Now Button */}
); }; export default ThreeStepGuide;
